Articles.Content:
Hi! I just bought and downloaded KSP (over Steam) and I am really excited to play! I just have one small problem. The game opens in a very small size. I cant make it full size or anything. I tried going to settings, and change to full-screen mode, but I cant click on the "accept" (Or whatever its called) button, because it is in my computers process bar! What should I do?! Please help!

Thanks alot.

You could edit the settings.cfg in the installation folder manually. Set your window setting to show you all file extensions and open it in a text editor an then fill in the appropriate values in those three fields:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1920
SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 1080
FULLSCREEN = True

if you are not comfortable changing settings files, you can also right click your process bar and check the auto-hide option so it vanishes

btw does just hitting enter apply the settings?
